pkgmetadata.longdescription: Relationship Between Species and Groups of Sites // Functions to assess the strength and statistical significance of the relationship between species occurrence/abundance and groups of sites [De Caceres Legendre (2009) doi:10.1890/08-1823.1]. Also includes functions to measure species niche breadth using resource categories [De Caceres et al. (2011) doi:10.1111/J.1600-0706.2011.19679.x].
